name: Ruku's Heart Balloon
description: A cute adventure story about a rabbit, Ruku, and a cat, Lish, just like in a picture book. Make a "heart balloon" with the flower puzzle. How far can you fly in the sky?

name: Oscar Wilde Card
description: He loves dinner parties. He loathes you. An amusing card game.

name: Idol Hell
description: Idol Hell is the beginner friendly bullet hell game! Play as Medli and fight through hoards of enemies and meet vibrant cute bosses! Play at your pace and choose from 4 difficulties!

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty
description:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

name: Timestride
description: Manipulate time to overcome obstacles in a clever way. A sci-fi FPS game with large variety of weapons and foes set in a remote military research lab where an experiment has gone horribly wrong.

name: Bearcycle
description: bearcycle combines fast-paced motorcycle racing with wacky platforming madness. Grind, grapple, and rocket your way through the forest, local city, and beyond! So grab some berries, catch some air, and land a trick in this unBEARably fun classic.

name: Outcasts of Dungeon
description: Outcasts of Dungeon is a third person fantasy action Being in the role of a powerful War Mage with dozens of deadly weapons and spells, defend your kingdom fortress from a rampaging mob of beastly invaders.

name: Belle Automata
description:
Belle Automata is a sci-fi otome game where you pilot sentient android, Aureve as she forges her own path navigating love, grief, self-acceptance.

Previously content with a life of tapestry-making alongside her master, but when he dies, she is sold off to a reclusive buyer. Thrown into a world of other sentient droids, she must find her place and above all, answer the question: how does one weave a new identity when strings to the old have been cut?

name: Lab Chaos
description: Lab Chaos is a fun and challenging indie action platformer game. If you're a casual gamer, a completionist or love to speedrun, Lab Chaos is the game for you.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Supporter II Upgrade
description: Sin descripción

name: Flip That Coin!
description: Flip That Coin! is a game about flipping coins up in a random direction and clicking on the coins to score points! How fast can you flip and click the coins?

name: Midnight
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikmin 2 Infernal Edition
description: A kaizo romhack for Pikmin 2 that limits your maximum Pikmin to 60, makes enemies and hazards stronger and more deadly, the Pikmin and captains much weaker, and more. Made by Antopikmin

name: Revelation M
description:
"Revelation M" is fantasy MMORPG with a stunning three-dimensional world where you are free to explore the sky and travel through the sea. Your brightest dreams will come true in the game; there are surprises everywhere, and you can discover the hidden truth in rich adventures; there are challenges and difficult dungeons that will require all of your skills and courage; you will find an elaborate system of profession development, which will help your character to unlock its potential in the best possible way; new face creating system gives you a wide range of options for selecting details and customization!

This version of Revelation M innovated upon the predecessor PC version with several design and development philosophies.

name: Bonfire Peaks: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: UzeMaze
description:
UzeMaze is a port of a game from the Commander X16 retro computer. It started life as the first ever, finished game for the Commander X16, called CX16 Maze.

The point of the game is to color in all the fields of the maze. Once you have chosen a direction, your character will continue moving in that direction until it hits a wall. Your job is to figure out a way to get all the black fields filled in with color.

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Jump To The Milky Way
description: In the game "Jump To The Milky Way" you will embark on an exciting journey through the vastness of space, jumping from platform to platform and exploring mysterious corners of the galaxy in search of portals to other worlds. Challenge gravity using the unique "space jump" technology and find portals to other worlds. Exciting space landscapes, unexpected obstacles, and incredible secrets await, which you can only uncover with your skills and ingenuity. Become a space traveler and discover new worlds in "Jump To The Milky Way"!

name: Pyramid Raiders
description: Pyramid Raiders is a hilarious split-screen game where four bumbling soldiers sneak out of their base to steal tons of gold from mysterious tombs. With physics-based gameplay and silly puzzles, players must navigate through obstacles and traps to successfully make their escape with all their loot.

name: Mario 3 Oasis
description: Mario 3 Oasis is a medium-difficulty, non-kaizo hack, great for streaming and speedrunning.

name: CrimeTrip
description:
CrimeTrip is a true crime adventure game in augmented reality from Prologue XR studio.
The objective of the game is to solve unsolved cold cases by exploring and investigating the crime scenes in augmented reality. The game features 6 real-life crimes, all of which are based on clever and notorious cases from the 70s and 80s. Players will have to analyze evidence and clues to solve the crimes, and as they progress, the game becomes more immersive and surreal, with captivating content and an atmospheric police station.
Take on the role of a True Crime fan in charge of investigating 6 mind-blowing true crimes, from the heist of the century to TV bombs, mafia vendetta, drug smuggling, gangster assassination, and even a fake currency exchange office run by the feds.
Discover unresolved true-crime cold-case in crime scenes and a police station that only becomes more and more surreal as the story progresses.
Use an array of investigative tools to elaborate your theories on unresolved true-crime cold cases and share them with fellow crime crazies.
But beware of what you may find... Maybe this is not a game, but rather a gateway into a real-life rabbit hole.

name: Burger Chef Tycoon Multiplayer Mode
description:
Join forces with your friend in the ultimate cooking adventure with this new Multiplayer Mode!

This DLC features an exciting local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Give Me Toilet Paper!
description: A game played with the Joy-Con inside a roll of toilet paper!

name: Iris and the Giant: Deluxe Soundtrack Edition
description: You play as Iris, who must brave her fears in her imaginary world.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Killer Night
description:
Killer Night is a fan reimagination of Five Nights at Freddy's 3, created to celebrate the game's 8th anniversary.

This is no traditional sit-&-survive game, however! Killer Night is a short point-&-click adventure game with different types of minigames and references to previous FNAF games, developed in 2 months!

name: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: The Tower of Doooom
description:
This DLC is exclusive to the Season Pass.

Enter the Tower of Doooom and meet its mysterious landlady, Madame Bwahstrella! Ascend the challenging tower to free your old friend Spawny in a new game mode focused on combat. Even if you can climb to the top, the end is only the beginning as you unlock new difficulty levels for infinite replayability! Build and upgrade your team throughout the expedition, plan strategically and triumph against all odds!

name: Arcade Archives: Sky Kid DX
description: Baron and Max take to the skies, fighting to protect Birdland!

name: Rider Among Dead
description: Rider Among Dead - Mad Zombie Killer Machine Survival is the number one action game that blends the mechanics of off-road racing and survival games. The world has been consumed by a zombie outbreak, leaving you to survive in the wasteland.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Midgar Special Pack
description: Your PowerWashing Services are needed in Midgar! From the gritty yet gripping world of one of Final Fantasy's most unforgettable installments comes five filthy new maps for PowerWash Simulator, featuring iconic locations, vehicles, and enemies.

name: Hentai Casual Swap
description: Enjoy this casual tile swap puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With an open gallery for simply relaxing!

name: Noah Please!
description: Dash and whack your way through waves of animals that want a piece of that ark. There's only room for two of each!

name: Hentai Cheerleader
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Space Pop: Bubble Shooter
description: "Blast off into the galaxy with our new bubble shooter game! Explore 200 levels set across stunning intergalactic environments and pop your way to victory. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, you'll enjoy hours of bubble-blasting fun.

name: Captain Meow
description: FPS RPG Action Adventure

name: Simple Increment
description: Simple but addictive idle clicker game for those who just wants to relax and have some fun.

name: 50 Rounds
description: A round based zombie killing experience. Each wave will be harder than the last with bosses showing up at possibly the worst of times. Good luck you will need it.

name: Welcome to Levy
description: All the women in Levy have disappeared. Why did they leave in bare feet? Discover their story along with 680 CGs and 11 unique endings in this apocalyptic visual novel.

name: Wheelie King 5
description: Online & Offline modes Customize bikes. Upgrade bikes. Wheelies, Endos, Real stunts & Drifting. Manual & Automatic gears.

name: Chains of Time
description: In this 2D RPG, Rollo will have to become much more than a street urchin and care for the survival of all people, instead of only his own.

name: Lilly's Flower Shop
description: Enjoy the Match 3 gameplay in an intriguing story about Lilly's building her flower shop. Earn coins by matching the gems and improve the entire neighborhood. Use 5 unique boosters like Flower Power. Meet different characters and enjoy the hand-drawn world full of flowers and plants.

name: The Smile Alchemist
description: Follow the growth of a young alchemist aiming to become the best in the world!

name: Live Factory
description:
Action-adventure platformer. Great graphics. Explore the underground factory!

Explore an underground factory hidden from eyes, filled with dangers, secrets and spatial puzzles. Use your wits and reaction to reveal all the secrets!

Excellent 3D graphics and music will immerse you in the atmosphere at their best. Responsive controls will help you to run away from trouble and make accurate jumps to the intended goal.

Features:
• Interesting gameplay
• Unusual visual style and beautiful 3D graphics
• New game mechanics and situations during your passing through
• Game made with a soul

name: Kawaii Dake ja Dame?
description: Romance/puzzle game centering on "landmine" girls.

name: Cthulhu Mythos RPG: Suishou no Yobigoe Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Yihongyuan
description: Can I float in life without becoming trapped in the mire of the dirt ,is myconfidence. Charm them with your personal charm.

name: Entropoly
description: Entropoly is a time-trial platformer inspired by platform fighters. Wavedash into the psychedelic realms of the elements and help Poly fight chaos to restore balance.

name: Lords of Infinity
description: Lead an ancient and crumbling noble house in a rich gunpowder fantasy setting. Lie, bribe, and conspire to secure power and prestige – or to save a doomed kingdom from itself.

name: Star Hive: The Menace
description: When humanity arrived on Mars, another civilization had arrived first. Then everyone knew that an invasion was imminent. Despite welcome preparations (a defense fleet with a freighter packed with missiles!), can humanity survive such an advanced invading horde?

name: Arclight of City
description: in the future, the crime rate of the city was high. The increase in the rate of crime had brought huge costs to the prison and the discipline system, and a large number of criminals would commit crimes again not long after they were released.Until someone proposed the "prison city"

name: I Commissioned Some Bees 14
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 20 art pieces to choose from, and 2000+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Ball laB 2
description: Roll and jump through challenging but interesting levels in a minimalistic style!

name: Aery: Calm Mind 3
description: Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: King of the Castle
description: King of the Castle is a Twitch-integrated social narrative game for 4-4000 players. The streamer plays the Monarch while everyone else plays the squabbling Nobles of their Council, who can vote on every decision and change the course of the Kingdom's history.

name: Rune Factory 3 Special
description:
Settle down in an idyllic fantasy town as a young adventurer with a monstrous secret in Rune Factory 3, remade for a new generation on Nintendo Switch and PC.

Features brand new to Rune Factory 3 Special include Newlywed Mode, standalone adventures unlocked after marriage to each of the game's 11 eligible bachelorettes; and a "Hell" difficulty level to challenge even veteran players!

Whether it's your first visit or you're returning after a long time away, experience the unforgettable story of Rune Factory 3 with improved graphics and redesigned 3D character models.

name: Escape First Alchemist
description: First-person escape game, playable solo, co-op, or pvp with up to 6 people. Solve riddles of a reclusive alchemist that trapped you in his workshop. Brew potions and overcome challenges as he laughs at your failures and makes light of your successes...But what if things are not what they seem?

name: Infested Fortress
description: Dig into the mountain, collect resources to build your fortress, grow your population and keep them alive (and happy), learn new deadly skills, gather and refine materials to craft powerful items so you can fend off the many dangerous monsters threatening your colony in turn-based tactical combat.

name: Elfheim: Chapter 1
description: Elfheim is a magical land beyond your wildest dreams! The king of the Slimes unexpectedly sets on an exciting adventure filled with lewd Elves, underlying mysteries and lighthearted fun!

name: Hero's Hour: Rogue Realms
description: Rogue Realms is a major expansion to Hero’s Hour, focusing on the wilderness and untamed lands - and the strange creatures, cults and societies that live there.

name: Bonfire Peaks: Lost Memories
description: Three chapters of DLC for this critically beloved puzzle game, each with new mechanics and new puzzles.

name: Meg's Monster
description: Take control of the Underworld’s grumpiest ghoul to help a lost little girl find her way home in this creepy-cute indie adventure. Just be warned: if she cries, the whole world dies.

name: Cosmic Ball Tournament
description: Cosmic Ball Tournament is a single-player, first-person platforming arcade game where your objective is to quickly get through stages whilst accumulating a high score. Use speed and precision to progress and become the Cosmic Ball Champion!

name: Daydream
description: This is a campus daily galgame, I hope you like it. 这是一款校园日常galgame，希望大家能喜欢。 これは日常系&学園モノのギャルゲーです。皆さん楽しんでいただけたら幸いです。

name: One Military Camp
description: Build and manage your own military camp, enrol the best recruits, set the training courses and finally send them on dangerous missions to win the war. But becoming a Military Tycoon also means improving your financial skills, so don’t forget to make your academy a profitable business.

name: Patch Quest
description:
Patch Quest is an action roguelike with metroidvania elements, set on a deserted tropical island.

Your lasso allows you to mount and ride all of the enemy types in the game, letting you use their powers in combat.

name: StorySpark
description:
Choose your adventure with StorySpark, the ultimate interactive story game that empowers you to shape your own path in every captivating narrative! Immerse yourself in a world where your choices matter, and every decision leads to a unique and thrilling story.

Dive into pages upon pages of fun interactive stories that cater to your every mood, spanning from heartwarming tales of love to nail-biting suspense exploration of magical school (not unlike Hogwarts).

name: Sokoblox
description: Sokoblox is a hybrid of two classic puzzle games: Sokoban (the push puzzle) and Bloxorz (the rolling block puzzle).

name: Spectral Filter
description: Spectral Filter is a short horror game developed by Austin Schaeffer over the span of about 2 months with an original soundtrack by Cyrus Byrd.

name: Silent Hill 2: 20th Anniversary Demake
description: A fan-demake of Silent Hill 2 for the Game Boy Color.

name: Legion Otherworld
description: Action role playing game set in a new fantasy world where you assume the role of village hero and try to stop a foe from conquering the area.

name: Shkilagames Story: Episode 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Nayla's Castle
description: Sin descripción

name: Genshin Impact: Windblume's Breath
description:
Version 3.5 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Dehya and Mika
• New main story quests: Chapter III, Act VI - Caribert
• New story quest for Dehya
• New hangout events for Faruzan
• New main event: Windblume's Breath
• …and more!

name: Shatter Realm
description: Shatter Realm is a short green ooze techbase-themed episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Autumn Break
description: Autumn Break is a mod for OMORI that takes place three days before the recital.

name: Adivinhe o Jogo
description: A quiz where have to guess the game name using the available reviews of the game, hints and soundtrack. Use the twitch integration so your chat can help you.

name: CoasterMania
description: CoasterMania is a physics-based VR rollercoaster game where you create the ride of your life! Use wacky contraptions and elements to fly through the sky, then experience your creation by jumping in the front seat.

name: So Much Stuff: Collector's Edition
description: The ultimate sorting and matching game!

name: Viking Rise
description: Explorar, construir e conquistar Midgard!

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: High Seas
description: The greatest adventures can be had on the ocean waves. Men, dwarves, elves and goblins dream of riches over the horizon. They also fear what may lurk in the depths of the sea.

name: Genshindle
description: Wordle game based on Genshin Impact characters.

name: Aquamorphosis
description: It's a horror game that tells a story about a fisherman who loses his way into another world during fishing.

name: Engage Kill
description:
Engage Kill is fully voiced adventure game with a character gacha system.
Its combat uses 3 character squads against waves of enemies with a turn-based system where the action order is visible while choosing action commands.
Completing combat tasks by using specific commands activates special attacks and increases the special gauge for stronger attacks but also adding more difficult tasks to complete.

Engage Kill was created as part of a mixed-media project called Project Engage, it was announced alongside an anime and manga called Engage Kiss.

name: Presentiment of Death
description:
Presentiment of Death is a fast-paced story-driven VR adventure of intuitive and aesthetic archery with an unusual passage of time, inspired by one of the best games SuperHot
Completely immerse yourself in the world with a special time dilation system, face robots and fight them because only in your power to stop the madness that is happening inside!
Remember that time is inextricably linked with archery, so get ready to act smart and think ahead

name: Beecarbonize
description: Research cutting-edge technologies, enact policies, protect ecosystems, and modernize industry to cut down carbon emissions. Manage your resources well and you might survive.

name: Hidden Gems, Hidden Secrets
description:
The members of the Hidden Gems Of Poetry Group are close. Even the move from internet forum to web server can't break their bond. But heartbreaking news could mean the end of things as they know it.

A short game made for SeedComp 2023. The writing is by Naomi Norbez, and the game was programmed by Josh Grams.

Please note that Hidden Gems, Hidden Secrets contains discussion of sexual harassment/coercion, and people in positions of power taking advantage of their place.

name: Line 88
description: Line 88 is a short kinetic novel with walking elements. It takes about 20 minutes to complete and has elements of horror.

name: Sokfest
description: Point-and-click your way through an online festival terrain, celebrating the 100th Sokpop game! Befriend the characters from all 100 Sokpop games, and explore a bustling festival with colourful characters!

name: Bassmaster Fishing: Digital Collector's Edition
description: Experience the thrill of competitive big bass fishing and climb the ranks to become the Bassmaster Classic champion. Dive into the fully licensed content from the Bassmaster series from amateur to elite events. Manage your sponsors, equip your dream setup, and customise the look of your angler to tackle the Bassmaster series.

name: Pet
description:
Pet is a horror visual novel about being in a city after a fun day out and how sometimes you gotta get home to take care of your cat.

It's a late night on an unseasonably warm day. On your way home to feed your cat Kuma, you stumble upon a vending machine in a dark alley.

name: Pokémon Go: Rising Heroes
description: The 10th season of Pokémon Go, "Rising Heroes", is themed by heroism and comic book aesthetics. It will introduce integration with the Pokémon Scarlet & Violet games (including the Pokémon Gimmighoul), new Elite Raids, a special research about Professor Willow's clothing and more weekly events.

name: Dead Inside
description: A thrilling, first-person, action-survival game set in the modern post-apocalypse. As mankind’s last hope, you’ll traverse the hospital ravaged by a lethal plague. the fight for survival gets progressively more difficult as the story unfolds. Be ready for violence.

name: Astra and The New Constellation
description:
Astra is the smallest star in Constellation Station. Tired of being picked on, she sets off an adventure to build a new constellation of her own!

Run, jump, slide, and float across the galaxy while collecting stardust to build your new home in this retro-inspired Pico-8 platformer.

name: Mafia in Town
description: A crime that is not proven is not a crime!

name: Dead Earth
description: A thrilling, first-person, action-survival game set in the modern post-apocalypse. As mankind's last hope, you'll traverse the hospital ravaged by a lethal plague. the fight for survival gets progressively more difficult as the story unfolds. Be ready for violence

name: Ball vs. Zombie
description: A stationary strategy tower defense game. Place balls to block zombies Don't let zombies into the house Player's hand speed, strategy matching, ball matching, Protect the surviving humans, the ball warriors protect the humans

name: Green Soldiers Heroes
description: Become a Super Soldier and defeat the terrorists.

name: UC Love
description: A humorous and wholesome anime-style dating simulator based on personified University of California schools + more! Romance 2D-girls (or guys) with 3D personalities in a cute and funny visual novel format! There are various locations to visit, minigames to play, and secrets to find!

name: Gunpowder Punk
description:
Gunpowder Punk is a game in pixel art cyberpunk world. You play as unnamed hero who fights against hordes of psycho gangers and their bosses.
Game made by single person.

name: Chess Morph: The Queen's Wormholes
description: An original puzzle game inspired by chess. Control a lonely Queen with shapeshifting abilities and defeat the enemy army. Move wisely, explore the wormholes on the board, take the enemy shape and kill them all.

name: Light of Alariya
description: Light of Alariya is an open-world, third-person, exploration puzzle game in which you traverse ancient alien temples and ruins to restore the power of the stars and awaken your sleeping civilization.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Finland
description: Puzzles of Finland!

name: Small Town Detective
description: Small Town Detective is a single-player game where you need to find the killer among other citizens!

name: Click & Cum
description: Click & Cum is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to start making streams. After every reached goal you gonna be surprised with amazing video with female protagonist.

name: Ruined Kingdom
description: Ruined Kingdom is a real-time strategy, RPG, and route attack game. Defeat the insolent humans and take from them whatever your heart desires, CONTROL the battlefield, Defeat rival tribes! Take control of an army of Orcs fighting to conquer! Win and gain experience to unlock new upgrades.

name: Sokoball Dreams
description: Sokoball Dreams is a minimalist puzzle game. The goal is to beat all the puzzles using the least possible moves.

name: Keeper of the Valley
description: Jump, glide and dash your way to the top of the mountain in this 3D adventure platformer set in an open and enchanting valley!

name: Full Gear
description: Engineer your way through a steampunk traditional roguelike. Create drones, use Cogwheels and Tokens, and dismantle many robotic enemies along your way to get all the way to the darkest secret of the dungeon.

name: Ball-e
description:
Ball-e is a singleplayer platformer with roguelike elements.
The player has to beat challenges and bosses to reach the top and become the ultimate Ninja Ball Warrior.

Many characters can be unlocked and various abilities and upgrades can be found during a run.

Additionally the player can compete in smaller challenges and become the fastest on the leaderboard.

name: Cosmic Crashers
description: Fast paced, action packed ropguelite in space. Pilot your space ship to defeat waves of enemies, but be careful - they are coming for your station.

name: Puppet Master: The Game
description:
Puppet Master: The Game is a Free to Play online multiplayer game that celebrates the series' 30 year legacy. Revisit iconic locations, Select from a large roster of playable characters from the movies.

Ever wanted to flip the standard Asymmetrical Multiplayer Horror Game formula? Where 3 heinous Puppets stalk a lone Human survivor? As a Human you must steal Andre Toulon's secrets of reanimation and escape with your life. As the Puppets must protect your Master’s secret at all cost! Sneak up on your prey and unleash a pint-sized siege of terror!

name: Konkan Coast Pirate Solutions
description: A puzzle game about helping pirate ships accomplish their pirate goals.

name: The Beastmaster Princess
description: In this fantasy visual novel, Take the role of Kunya and find out what happened to prince Merril with the help of Luna, Takara, Manila and Lyara. You'll face numerous dangers and in doing so, perhaps you will discover love along with the hidden power of Lyara, the beastmaster princess.

name: Unforgettable Voyage
description: Unforgettable Journey is casual pirate themed sokoban-like puzzle adventure game.

name: Furikake Spacey
description: Furikake Spicy is a Neo Showa Visual Novel!

name: Extra Lives
description: See how long you can survive in a world full of brainless zombies and heartless humans! Find your place among hundreds of other characters spread across several warring factions, and battle to reclaim every corner of a sprawling city in real-time.

name: Pete's Peril
description: Solving puzzles of all skill levels, dodging boulders, grabbing diamonds, upgrading tools, clothing for different climates and crush enemies along the way is all part of Pete's Peril.

name: A Simple Request
description: This place is full of mysteries, weirdness and inexplicable things. You come to the suburbs to a motel, you don't know yet that your friendly neighbors are not at all what they want to seem. Can you save yourself and keep your sanity?

name: The Nameless Braves: Heaven
description: The Nameless Braves is a kinetic-style Visual Novel. Set in the fantasy continent of Ankh-Seah during a dour era referred to as "The Dark Age", one young man strives through trials and heartbreak to accomplish his dream of becoming a hero.

name: Alephant
description: Alephant is an abstract sokoban-like puzzle game about rules and languages. Solve tutorial-less puzzles and help Alephant find a way to communicate.

name: SlipDream Resonator
description: SlipDream Resonator is a multi-directional rhythm game with unique twin-stick controls. Inspired by both classic rhythm games and top-down shooters, SlipDream Resonator offers addictive arcade gameplay designed to challenge while featuring eye catching visuals and a heart pumping soundtrack.

name: Apocalyptic Vibes
description: An immersive retro first-person shooter on GZDoom. You are a lone wanderer walking through the endless wasteland. Your destination is vague... Search the ruins of a dead civilization, get into gunfights, survive in severe post-apocalyptic weather. And find the meaning along the way.

name: Leap
description: Leap is a fast-paced, multiplayer first-person shooter featuring epic battles with up to 60 players, each armed to the teeth. Become an elite Leap mercenary as you soar into battle. Fight for either the United Earth Defense Coalition (UEDC) or the rebel Exo-Terrans - whoever pays the most, wins your trigger finger and excessive arsenal.

name: Gone Rogue
description: Get into the role of a thief from the city slums. Your weapons are your dexterous fingers, your skills are your cunning, attentiveness and planning, your motivation is silent disobedience to the will of the ruling party. Lurking in the shadows, slip unnoticed past enemies, get behind any locked doors, and carry off rich loot. But it's not just money and valuables you're after. In this harsh and unjust world, many need help, and it is in your power to help them.

name: A Fox and His Robot
description: Become a fox and escape the grip of powerful Artificial Intelligences in a 2D action-platformer. A young fox and his robot search for meaning in a beautiful yet dangerous world.

name: Frontiers Reach
description: Jump into a starfighter in service of the privateer fleet of the frontier worlds and take on the encroaching authoritarian regime of the Sol Confederacy Consolidate Navy as they attempt to bring war to the frontier worlds.

name: Unification
description: Gravity / Control / Chaos / Silence / Rebirth

name: Esperia ~ Uprising of the Scarlet Witch ~
description: Dive into the world of Esperia, a fantasy tactical RPG with visual novel elements! Lead Diana and her allies into grid-based tactical battles to uncover the secrets of the Kingdom and the world.

name: We Are Screwed!
description: Save the Multiverse in We Are Screwed!, a chaotic co-op space action game for 1-4 players! Team up and face swarms of foes as you pilot your way through a procedurally generated galaxy. Blast your enemies, extinguish fires, clean up, repair, recycle and explore where no one has screwed up before!

name: Jet-Paco: Hyper Special Space Agent!
description: Sin descripción

name: Advanced Shells III
description: Sin descripción

name: Abraxas
description: 1999. Four childhood friends (Clarice, Afonso, Sabrina and Marcos) decide to get together in a country house to reminisce about the good old days. However, at nightfall, Clarice proposes a dangerous prank to the group... Something seems to have gone terribly wrong.

name: Bitter/Sweet Blythe
description:
On their birthday, Bunnie (renameable + pick your pronouns) makes a wish, but will they get more than they bargained for when a bunny-eared being named Blythe shows up to give them their best-ever birthday?

Made in under a month for Yandere Jam 2023.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: SnowRunner Trucks
description: Sin descripción

name: Blither
description: A digital implementation of the board game.

name: Line: Monster Farm
description:
The latest work of the legendary breeding game "Monster Farm"!
Monsters are born from Line friends, raised and battled!

name: Clockwork Manor
description:
Venture into the clockwork manor, a mysterious place that seems to know your deepest desires. Do daily tasks as the manor's new maid, while the manor impedes you at every step!
This is an 18+ game made for the Strawberry Jam 7 game jam. In particular, it has elements of hypnosis, reality shifting, and transformation.

name: Little Guy Adventure
description: Little Guy Adventure is a pixel platformer where you play as Little Guy, a Shadow Girl who loves to do parkour. That's all I got.

name: Urban Flow: Streets Supplement
description:
Introducing 5 new vehicles to the streets of Urban Flow, each one unique and with its own style.

Get ready to add some variety to your gameplay with this new addition, you'll have a wider range of vehicles to guide, making traffic control and city navigation more fun and thrilling than ever before!

name: I Was the Cat
description:
You ever have a bad day?
Well... Today you have.

Work sucks. Your partner sucks.
And you think... maybe... life isn't worth it.

Until an angel bumps into you.

And, just like that, you have a whole new purpose in life.

Follow our unlikely heroine, as she navigates her newfound zeal for life and pursues the woman of her dreams.

name: Tiles Town
description: Explore a town made out of Domino tiles and talk to its inhabitants.

name: Destiny 2: Legacy Collection
description: This edition includes The Witch Queen, Beyond Light, and Shadowkeep. Play through three epic campaigns, unlock 37 Exotic weapons, 15 Exotic pieces of armor, and the power of Stasis, allowing you to lock down and control the battlefield.

name: I Was a Soft-boy on Tiktok...
description: A little story about an interesting experience with a certain app

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of Defiance
description: In the aftermath of the attack on the Traveler, the Vanguard calls upon its closest allies. Guardians must master the righteous powers of the Awoken to stand against the encroaching Shadow Legion and prove themselves as Queensguard.

name: Bridge to Another World: Cursed Clouds
description: Gather your courage for this mystical journey to a distant world!

name: Cockroach Simulator: Household Survivor
description:
Cockroach Simulator: Household Survivor Allows you to simulate being a cockroach that even you can't imagine. In its view, you too are a terrible thing.

This is not the adventure to the wonderland.
Neither not the role playing as the superhero or protagonist on the viral television programs.
If you are looking something new, such as role playing as a creature even you are scary of, we are proudly introducing you a Cockroach Simulator!
The simulator game that letting you survive in the dirty house of huntsman as a cockroach.
Enjoy your cockroach life with a lovely fatty uncle in Cockroach Simulator household survivor today!!

name: Ghosted
description: Guide the ghosts home by solving color puzzles. After solving color puzzles designed by a unique master, you will soon become a puzzle master too. Oh, and don't miss Master's big band music.

name: Dog Puzzle
description: Help the two dogs dig out the bones they hid in the dirt..."Dog Puzzle" is a challenging puzzle game that requires you to think carefully without worrying about time limits.

name: Abyss of Fire
description: A peaceful kingdom is frozen by the curse of the ice witch Kione. The mysterious girl "Laila" who appeared from somewhere and the mysterious spirit "Flara" who appeared from somewhere head to the kingdom to solve the curse of the kingdom together!

name: Quacktown Smackdown
description: Play as a Rubber Ducky in this 3rd Person Arena Shooter! Utilize squirt guns and water abilities and sink your opponents to become top duck of the tub! Battle it out in the Bubble Bath Battlefield or the Stormy Sandbox. Customize your ducky to make sure the lobby knows who's the Smack Down King!

name: Mahjong: Legacy of the Toltecs
description: Become the best mahjong player in the world in the great mahjong game "Mahjong Legacy of the Toltecs"! Search for an ancient, powerful artifact that will help you find incredible treasures. Overcome obstacles, collect magical mana and become a legendary adventurer.

name: Fingerspelling Unleashed: BANZSL Edition
description: Fingerspelling Unleashed: BANZSL Edition focuses on teaching you the two handed sign language alphabet of the British/Australian/New Zealand hearing impaired communities.

name: Exterminator
description: A sudden outbreak of anomalies all over the world. It is invisible to others, but you can see it. Only you can solve this situation. Go to the suspected source and listen to the request of the client. It's hard to figure out the location of the monsters, so you have to be strong and go.

name: Striker of Sky
description: It is a drone sports game that implements the actual drone soccer game system based on VR and multiplayer.

name: First Person Hooper
description: First Person Hooper is a skill based, arcade-style basketball game focused on the jump shot. Featuring first-person shooter controls with a lock-on system similar to modern FPS games, players can easily shoot the ball with power & timing mechanics relative to location on the court. Score with movement bonuses and get rewarded with power-ups for every swish and bank shot you make. Get shots up in a relaxed island setting and customize the court to fit your mood. Includes score, time-attack, and free play modes.

name: Paranormal Girlfriend
description:
Welcome to Paranormal Girlfriend, a visual novel with elements of 3D investigation, a mystical atmosphere and a gripping plot.
Takashi, a writer, a man who rarely leaves his house without opening the curtains, discovers that he has a girl in his apartment! He doesn't know who she is or how she got there. Maybe he's already going crazy, or maybe it's worse than that...
Enter the mysterious world of Paranormal Girlfriend and enjoy a thrilling story full of mystery and enigma.
You will have to explore 3D locations, make choices, interact with the objects of the environment.

name: Splatoon 3: Inkopolis
description:
Wave 1 was released on 28 February 2023 and added Inkopolis Plaza from Splatoon as an alternate hub world accessible via the subway station found in Splatsville. From here, players have access to services as they originally appeared in Splatoon, including Ammo Knights, Cooler Heads, Jelly Fresh, Shrimp Kicks, and Spyke, although they share the same lineup as their Splatsville counterparts. Certain shops are run by new characters. Additionally, the Squid Sisters perform City of Color (2023) in concerts during the first half of Splatfests and sing Tomorrow's Nostalgia Today during the second half, both while wearing their original outfits from Splatoon.

Additionally, the Great Zapfish can be seen atop Inkopolis Tower and the amiibo box retains its functionality. Other features from Splatoon 3 have also been added, such as a Grizzco Industries building and a Tableturf Battle Dojo hidden behind several buildings. The grate leading to Octo Valley is blocked off by a tire and a stack of boxes, while the arcade machine is covered up and replaced with a terminal to remotely access Hotlantis.

name: The Specter Chronicles: Episode 1 - The False Prophet
description: The Specter Chronicles is a cyberpunk visual novel that combines text-based adventure with turn-based tactical combat.

name: Feed Him
description: Welcome to Feed Him, a horror-themed adventure game set in a small, innocent-looking town. Uncover dark secrets, explore eerie places, defeat your evil roommate and escape before it's too late. Immerse yourself in a spine-chilling experience with stunning graphics.

name: Elephantasy: Flipside
description: Use and upgrade magic items, collect hidden treasures, and uncover the secrets between two worlds in this cute isometric puzzler! When a certain vacationing Elephant stumbles upon a way into the land of the dead, will she unwittingly let something far more sinister slip through?

name: Sexy Valentine
description: Sexy Valentine is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the romantic parts of life. The protagonist was left without plans and friends for Valentine's Day, and decided to use a dating app. After choosing several similarly lonely guys, he makes a date with them.

name: Skyemont Battle
description: Battle your way through hordes of enemies, find treasure, and explore cool maps! Skyemont Battle is a simple hack and slash designed to be fun an easy to pick up with a survival style twist.

name: SnowRunner: Season 9 - Renew & Rebuild
description: This product is included in the Year 3 Pass for SnowRunner. Devastated by ravaging wildfires, Ontario counts on you in Season 9: Renew & Rebuild. Clear logs from fallen trees, secure the buildings and bring materials to renovate burnt infrastructures.

name: Project: Waterfall
description: Welcome to the game Project: Waterfall! Here you are the protagonist who draws lines to the heart of cute and beautiful girls in a fantasy world. Pass a lot of levels and get a hundred achievements. Have fun playing!

name: Neopunk
description: An open world cyberpunk retro RPG. Start a new life as an agender mercenary who moves to the dark and neon lit streets of Kaanalos City. Freedom awaits you in Neopunk. Solve a murder. Buy apartments. Deliver pizza. Who will you be?

name: Clive 'N' Wrench: Collector's Edition
description:
Clive ‘N’ Wrench is a 3D platformer starring Clive, a rabbit, and Wrench, the literal monkey on his back. Your adventure takes you hurtling through time and space in a 1950’s refrigerator on a heroic quest to thwart the tyrannical Dr Daucus and stop his evil plans.

The Collector's Edition includes:
- The base game
- A fridge magnet
- 16 collectible art cards
- A full color manual
- The original soundtrack

name: End of world: Survivors
description: It is the end of the world and you have survived in an under ground bunker. It is your job to rescue survivors and bring them back to your home. You will need to provide them with the means to live by going out in to the zombie infested world and collecting items.

name: The Excrawlers
description: Action-RPG roguelike game in which you and others hero will have to plunge into the dark atmosphere of dungeons full of monsters and madness.

name: Tower Survivors
description: Fight an endless horde of evil minions and survive as long as you can. Collect loot and purchase new upgrades and magic abilities. Summon allies to stand along side you and survive the horde!

name: Rustled Pete
description: Rustled Pete is an arcade boss fighting platformer where you play as a chicken that is fighting for it's life against the very rustled and angry Pete. Unlock Pete's other forms to challenge yourself and also put him in his place!

name: Dreadful River
description: The realm is under attack. The king and his most loyal guards are trying to save the Eternal Crown. Floating down a vast river on a simple raft, you have to fight enemies, improve your gear, find allies and explore mysteries along the shores. Can you turn the tide?

name: Dungeons of Aether
description: Dungeons of Aether is a turn-based dungeon crawler designed by Nick ‘ampersandbear’ Blackwood from the Aether Studios team. Rivals of Aether is known for its intense competition and twitch skills, while Dungeons of Aether allows you to take things at your own pace - but it’s still just as challenging! Every choice you make can lead you deeper into the dungeons or to an early demise.

name: Rytmos
description: A relaxing puzzle game where you create music by solving mazes.

name: Scars Above
description: Scars Above is a challenging sci-fi third-person action adventure shooter combining the rewarding feel of overcoming difficulty with a compelling and intricate story, set in a mysterious alien world to explore.

name: Tropicalia
description:
Tropicalia is an RPG about Brazilian mythology, set in the country before colonization where you play Kaique, a little Guarani warrior, who had his girlfriend kidnapped by the demigod Tau. Gather materials to craft new items. Have fun grinding at quick battles. Test your strategies against challenging bosses. Fish, swim, dive, jump, embroil.
Here you will not meet Dragons and Dwarves. But get ready to face Kurupiras and Boetatas.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall
description: Shattered glass glints in the starlight. Soldiers of the Shadow Legion battle with Guardians under the unmistakable shadows of the fleet overhead—the Witness and its newest disciple are here. Find strength in the Light, arm yourself with Darkness, and peer beyond the veil as you raise the stakes on an already unforgettable campaign. Travel to a destination unlike any you've explored in Destiny 2. Cross paths with bone-chilling Tormentors and valiant Cloud Striders, join the fight against the Shadow Legion, and prevent devastation in the technologically advanced secret city of Neomuna.

name: Dark Chess
description: Dark Chess is a game of chess with fog of war. Fast paced PvP battler based on classic rules. Whether you are a die-hard chess-lover or an amateur board game admirer, Dark Chess will appeal to anyone who likes the thrill of battle.

name: Cold Shell
description: Future, one of Earth's colonies. There was a war your home country lost. Occupation forces don't care about people - crime and decadence are everywhere. Protagonist lost her parents during the war and works on a shitty job. She took a baseball bat to fight off thugs who try to attack her on her way home.

name: Demolition Master
description: Demolition sandbox with different guns including nature powers. Slow down time, change gravity and much more to play around! With compaign and sandbox mods.

name: Phantom Brigade
description: Phantom Brigade is a cinematic, real-time and turn-based tactical RPG, focusing on in-depth customization and player-driven stories. As the last surviving squad of mech pilots, you must capture enemy equipment and facilities to level the playing field. Outnumbered and out-gunned, lead The Brigade through a desperate campaign to retake their war-torn homeland.

name: Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer
description: The free swapping puzzle game with stunning 4K Waifus, 10 free Waifus, beautiful Waifu gallery, chill lofi music, and customizable settings. Experience the sizzling allure of Waifu Summer today!

name: Mafia 1x1
description: Mafia 1x1 is a card battling game where you play as the mafia team or the civilian team. There are 5 murderers among the 15 residents of the house, find them playing as civilians or deceive your opponent playing as the mafia. There are many roles in the game, from which you can assemble a unique composition and come up with your own winning tactic.

name: Limbus Company: Season 1 - Orientation
description:
Season 1: Orientation, is the first Season of Limbus Company, coinciding with the game's launch.

It consists of the game's Prologue and first three Story Chapters, the first Mirror Dungeon and Line 1 of Refraction Railway, as well as the release of 13 Identities based on story content and 13 E.G.O exclusive to the Season's Pass.

It also consists of the game's first Detour Tale, Hell's Chicken. This event adds an additional 2 Identities and 2 E.G.O to the season.

name: Deadly Disco
description: This is a high score chaser where you dance on a collapsing floor to gain points.

name: Jaded
description: Jaded ﻿is a large ﻿﻿dark techbase slaughtermap by lunchlunch influenced by Fractured Worlds, Miasma, Magnolia, Abandon, Occula, and Newt. It was a runner-up at the 2023 Cacowards.

name: WhereTaken Classic
description:
The aim of the game is to guess what country/region the photo was taken in.
If you guess incorrectly, the game will tell you how far away you are, and displays an arrow, that points in the direction of the correct country/region.
A new WhereTaken will be available everyday!

name: Haunted Lands: Burial Grounds
description: Dark and bloody retro inspired action platformer. Slay the grim cultists, the infernal minions and twisted nightmarish creatures that roam the Haunted Lands.

name: Secret Spy: Operation Love
description: As the world's top special agent, your job is to save your target and yourself from a deadly plot that could end your career—permanently. You've trained from an early age to be completely untraceable, but now you've got a sassy heiress hostage, a dependable mission coordinator, and a renowned gadget expert all yearning to declassify your personal dossier. Will you remain an enigma as you travel across the globe or will you decide to reveal bits and pieces of yourself, eagerly leaving much to their imagination?

name: Find the Energy
description: Find the Energy is a free educational game for all ages that teaches about renewable energy via exploration and quests.

name: Retro Style: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cache Grabbers
description: Cache Grabbers is a chill first-person cartography puzzle game. Navigate through 30 levels in a strange environment, using only your compass, metal detector and shovel to find and grab the cache — and maybe even a way to escape.

name: Pokémon Scarlet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description: A two-part story expansion for Pokémon Scarlet.

name: Pokémon Violet: The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero
description: A two-part story expansion for Pokémon Violet.

name: Pocket Lights
description: The classic light-toggling game for the Panic Playdate!

name: Kiting Mechanics
description: Kiting Mechanics is a training game for MOBAs. Sharpen your kiting skills and develop strong muscle memory by dodging famous MOBA spells recreated with 1-to-1 speed, timing and hitbox.

name: New Year Break
description: New Year Break is retro arcade game with animated characters, powerups and custom music. Collect bonuses and powerups and blast your way thru the 30 Levels into the New Year. Simple controls and retro arcade action. Collect all the powerups to stack powerups.

name: Virtual Families 3
description: The sequel to the smash hit mobile game “Virtual Families 2” is here!

name: Anarchy: RedLine Skin Set
description: RedLine Skin Set

name: Retro Style: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Endless Spaceship
description: Defend yourself from thousands of obstacles and enemies, the more points, the better placed in the world ranking!

name: Vincent's Horror Story
description: In Vincent's Horror Story, players are immersed in a spine-chilling and bizarre atmosphere teeming with frightening monsters and mind-bending challenges.

name: Interstellar Conquest
description: Take planets and assemble your fleet. The conquest of space is now, navigate through asteroid fields and hide in nebulas to outsmart your opponents. Experience the challenge of ion storms disrupting your ship's sensors and become the ultimate space fleet commander.

name: Special Courier
description: Special things require special attitude!

name: Fateweaver: The Alchemist's Quandary
description: You are The Fateweaver; an ancient beast of legendary status. It is your job to determine which way Fate will unravel as you dig deep into the psyche of those who beckon. Decide whether to help those who beg for your mercy, or invoke the wrath of the Gods upon those you deem unworthy of existence...

name: Ozymandias: The World
description: Including a new map: The World!

name: DownhillMadness
description: Shoot hundreds of projectiles and guide them to the goals to make the most money! Complete challenges, unlock levels, and discover new techniques!

name: Kitten Lost Her Box
description: Help tiny Kitten get back her favorite paper box only with her agile actions. In this tight platformer kitten brave hand-crafted challenges, meet cute creatures and finally fight with her old enemy!

name: Colors’ Heartbeat
description: A roguelite game that combines turn-based command battles and card games. Collect cards and reach the ending.

name: Artificial
description: Dig into the truth hidden in the artist's strange paintings through the puzzle.

name: Basements n' Basilisks: Storms of Sorcery
description: A visual novel paying satirical homage to the world’s greatest TTRPG. Make important choices, roll countless dice, build lasting relationships, explore magical lands and experience all the rest of the crap you expect from a fantasy game without the hassle of finding actual friends to play with!

name: Hyper Pop
description: Hyper Pop is a frantic action rogue-lite bullet heaven. Use your mouse cursor to guide and protect your character as it grows to become absurdly overpowered against hordes of cute emojis!

name: Gatekeeper: Eclipse
description: Fast-paced rogue-lite shooter. Gatekeeper: Eclipse is a prologue ver. of the game Gatekeeper. Go on a quest to find the stolen Heart of the Universe and shoot your way through the hordes of machine enemies in solo or in co-op with friends!

name: Pop Journey
description: Pop Journey is a leisure game that lets you relax. You will ride the train with Meidu to the distance. The journey is long. You can enjoy the scenery outside the window and find the happiness in the journey together.

name: Stellar Mess: The Princess Conundrum - Chapter 1
description: Stellar Mess is a 2D point&click adventure game, set somewhere in Argentinean Patagonia. The game is inspired by early classic EGA games of the genre.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season 11
description:
A new manhunt has begun with the launch of Season 11: Reign of Fire!
Here is all you need to know about Season 11 - the third and final season for Year 4 of The Division 2.

name: The Ouroboros King
description: The Ouroboros King combines the strategic tactical depth of chess with the build variety and replayability of roguelikes. Build a formidable army, discover powerful relics, and buy surprising gadgets to defeat the three evil witches.

name: Toy Rider: Racing Game
description: Toy Rider is a mobile car racing game, what makes it different from a typical car racing game is, it is not just about speed it is about balancing, timing, proper use of power-ups & proper speed! The game is inspired by the Table Top Racing & Micromachine game but with lots of upgrades and improvements. One of the best offline racing game

name: Limbus Company
description: As the Executive Manager of Limbus Company, lead your group of twelve Sinners, venture into the buried facilities of Lobotomy Corporation, and lay claim on the Golden Boughs.

name: Fiasco Restoration and Repair
description: Fiasco Restoration and Repair is a game about free-form art restoration without any of the proper tools or know how. The only resources available to you are those you can scavenge from the garage. Improvise solutions to complex problems, make mistakes, and restore the artwork no matter the cost!

name: Otherwar
description:
Otherwar is an action tower defense game. Take control of an angel and defend heaven from the satan's armies.

Unlike other Tower Defense games, Otherwar's cast of enemies will keep you on your toes as almost every enemy fires a different kind of projectile. From the ever-following eyeballs to slowly approaching wide spider webs and patterns of swirling leaves cast by undead treants.

Before each mission you will have a chance to select towers and skills that will aid you in battle. From straight-forward offensive towers to more situational constructs such as slowing fields that will bog down approaching enemies or emplacements that shoot down incoming projectiles.

name: Destructure: Among Debris
description: DESTRUCTURE: Among Debris is an intense mix of brick breaker, air hockey and bullet hell set in a post apocalyptic world. Destroy structures, dodge bullets, fire guns and buy perks to lay even more waste!

name: Tacape
description: Tacape is a deck-builder card game with roguelite elements for those who love a tactical challenge. Take part in a series of combats, build your strategy, upgrade your cards, and face folkloric creatures along the way!

name: Self Gunsbase
description: Self gunsbase - Actions take place in an anomalous forest / cave where monsters live. Everything has been moved to the cartoon style.

name: Kings of Hell
description: Kings of Hell is a 3D Beat Em Up in the vein of the early 2000 era beat em ups!

name: Lovely Girl Puzzle
description: Easy relaxing puzzle. Lovely girls are waiting for you!

name: Shopping Center Tycoon
description: Shopping Center Tycoon Is : Market Simulation & Tycoon and Improve your market. Grow, Design and Manage your Shopping Center with the right Strategy.

name: I am Your President
description: Play as another US president! Decide the fate of the world and run the country any way you like. Do you wish to start a war or make peace? Take care of the poorest or support capitalists? Advocate for gun rights or stand against them? It is all up to you!

name: VHS Slaughter
description: VHS Slaughter is a game attempting to recreate the atmosphere of VHS 80's films and classic PSX horror games.

name: Fish
description: Sin descripción

name: 2in1
description:
Developed by Jeffrey Daniels for the BASIC 10liner Contest in 2023, this program contains two distinct games that play in succession.

UFO RUSH is a two key game. Evade collision using any two keys (some keys steer left, the others steer right). Recommended keys include: Z X C E R S F : ; / L

BOMBER is a one button game. Clear the skyline and land using any key.

It switches to Bomber when you score at finish the game with at least 4 points.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Akbar Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Mughal civilization with its Leader Akbar.
Playing as him gives you:

- Unique units (Gajnal & Mansabdar Cavalry)
- Unique great person (Architect of Wonder)
- Unique building (Red Fort)
- And much more!

name: Darkland 3
description: DARKLAND is a fun retro-style platform game! Our protagonist, the shadow hero, must cross the valley to find the key to open the portal. There are dangers along the way, pay attention to the traps on the head and the spikes under the feet. Step on the enemy and destroy them, being careful not to fall off the cliff. The game has 50 levels. Wish you have a good time!

name: Adachi Dating Simulator
description: This is just a meme dating game.

name: Project B
description: Project B is a free multiplayer browser shooter that doesn't require any registration to play. It contains two game modes: deathmatch and killrace. In deathmatch, players are ranked based on their amount of kills. In killrace, the player with the least amount of kills is eliminated after every round.

name: Post Hero
description: Post Hero is an adventure game where you play as a mail carrier on his first day on the job. What should be a walk in the park turns out to be anything but! Who knew you'd need to outsmart a vampire, help someone change a flat tire, foil a porch pirate, save a relationship and learn magic just to drop off some packages? All of this and more awaits you in Post Hero!

name: Manual Overcycle
description: Manual Overcycle is the evolution of bicycle gameplay. With it's unique physics-based gameplay, bicycle gamers finally have the expressive controls they have always dreamed of.

name: Q.u.q.
description: Q.u.q. is a surreal visual novel about a somewhat crude girl that wanders a desert.

name: Nightly Trash
description: You're an average-joe in a 1950's like aesthetic, working at a diner while taking out the trash. Each night has different events as you play through, so keep your eyes open for anything... off...

name: Mr. Mat Hematic
description: Mr. Mat Hematic is a short, fun, 2D platformer puzzle game where you must use given mathematical operations to alter the environment so you can move around. To complete a level, you need to reach the black door.

name: Flare Nuinui Quest
description: Nuinui quest is a Mega Man style platformer featuring Shiranui Flare and various other Hololive characters.

name: Elemental World
description:
In this fascinating action adventure RPG with roguelike elements and great pixel art graphics you explore randomized worlds by combining the elements to cast powerful spells.

Use the environment and improve your skills to defeat the hordes of monsters lurking within. Find powerful items, meet strange creatures and play different unique classes in your quest to solve the mysteries of the Elemental World.
Challenge your friends for a brawl or let them join your quest in amazing games!

name: Partum Artifex
description: A first-person atmospheric horror-puzzle game that focuses on the narrative to tie together the gruesome world with creative puzzles. Explore the mind of a twisted serial killer who wants nothing else than to show his work of art as well as tell his story to the world.

name: Lord of the Other World
description: This game is a more casual strategy war game, it bid farewell to the endless confrontation between players in traditional strategy games! More emphasis on collaboration between players.

name: Dueling Nexus
description:
Dueling Nexus is a free-to-play Yu-Gi-Oh! Online game. Dueling Nexus is automated, making it the perfect online platform for testing cards and learning the game as its impossible to make an invalid move, this also makes it impossible for your opponents to cheat.

Dueling Nexus works on all major operating systems including Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iOS, Chrome OS and others. Due to its low power requirements, nearly any device is capable of playing on Dueling Nexus at good speeds.

Dueling Nexus is frequently updated, new cards are added shortly after being announced, long before they are printed and released to the general public. This gives our players an unique opportunity to test new cards before they decide to purchase them.

Nyx is an advanced dueling robot players can use to test their decks. Nexus AI can use over 30 unique decks. To duel the AI start by making a deck in our Deck Editor and then head over to the Duel Zone and click on: Play against a basic bot.

Our Yugioh Deck page is the largest database of yugioh decks in the world. You can use our advanced algorithm to help you sort through thousands of new decks shared every day. We have meta, casual and even rush decks.

name: Royal Merchant
description: Blending together traditional RPG systems, tycoon mechanics, and a fantasy overworld. You will manage a team of Heroes, Crafters and Own Castle.

name: Based Refueling
description: Oh boy, it's another Refueling Base remake! An aggressive, limit-removing, single player take on the original with similarly open-ended and challenging gameplay in more modern terms.

name: Villainess Idolized By Everyone
description:
Eyes on her phone in the middle of the road, our heroine is hit by a truck and reincarnates into the game she had the misfortune of playing at that moment.

Now she's a villain of an otome, and she has to avoid a terrible fate!..

Or does she? Is the voice from the sky going to be of any help?

name: Pokémon Giovanni Origins
description:
In this story, set roughly 20 years before the events of Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue, you play as the childhood friend of Team Rocket Boss Giovanni.

Growing up in Saffron City, you and Giovanni will traverse Kanto and Johto together, challenging for gym badges and championships along the way. You will witness first hand the backstory of Giovanni, watching from the sidelines as your friend ventures down a dark path, turning to a life of crime.

As you explore Kanto and Johto, you will see the vast difference 20 years can make to a region. You will find characters and references to the future games hidden everywhere you look. Enjoy exploring the Pokémon world long before the stories of legendary Pokémon trainers such as Red and Blue.

name: My Pizza Story
description: Introducing My Pizza Story, the ultimate idle RPG management simulator game where you can Role-play as a cute Komo Chef and build your very own pizza palace!

name: Hungry Monster
description: You have reincarnated as a hungry monster, who is eating candies. Avoid the bombs and collect the time to live longer.

name: Mold 2: Origin
description:
"Mold 2: Origin

" takes place before the first game in the series... explaining the origin of the mold curse. Stan lives in an isolated location with his wife Mary. He has metal detection as a hobby. After finding a strange amulet things start to get really weird.

Is it possible to break this curse? what is the origin of all this?...

name: It Gets So Lonely Here
description:
You are running through a forest.

It is late at night and the sky is as black as pitch.

The trees which surround you, jutting out of the earth like eerie monuments to a foreign god, are blotting out most of the moonlight.

You do not know where you are going.

You have no map; no route; no plan.

You have no desire, as you run, save to escape.

You cannot let yourself be caught.

All you can do is run, on and on and on...

But, despite all of your hard work, your best efforts will, invariably, be in vain. It’s already too late for you. After all...

You’ll never be able to escape from me.

name: Uwagaki Ai
description: A tragic story of repeated overwriting. Exploration type ADV I woke up in a laboratory. I immediately noticed something strange, but the erosion had begun. In a certain laboratory, I started an experiment. The first and last experiment for me, risking everything...

name: Sentry Paragon
description: In this isometric action game where enemies are coming at us in droves, we are trying to defend ourselves and survive against the growing and strengthening enemies by making the right strategy and moves!

name: Sun Down
description: Farm crops, collect pets, catch fish, mine ores and craft turrets to build a thriving farm and survive waves of monsters through 4 seasons. Sun Down combines Roguelike and Farm Sim gameplay in a brand new game set in the Sun Haven Universe.

name: Autumn-Time Trade-Up
description: A game about speed, optimization, and exploration! Meet loads of unique characters on your way to the top of the spire! You are given four minutes to save Thanksgiving through various wacky means. Can you get everyone to the top of the Spire for the perfect Thanksgiving feast?

name: Scrappage
description: In this unforgiving roguelite twin stick shooter, death awaits you behind every corner. Fight your way through hordes of monsters, eliminate bosses and loot their valuable items and body parts. With them you can enhance your own body, unlock powerful skills and create your own unique builds.

name: Pixel Town: Akanemachi Mystery
description: Welcome to the small, quaint town of Akanemachi. Eerie disturbances have been popping up after a recent earthquake, shaking up the residents' lives. Aya, a perfectly normal woman of the town, takes it upon herself to investigate the mysteries and banish the looming evil.

name: Sex, Love & Girls
description: Sex, Love & Girls is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the romantic parts of life The protagonist had a good time the night before, got drunk and liked a bunch of girls on a dating app. After receiving date offers, he makes a date with them and goes in search of true love.

name: Elong Plug
description: Play as an elastic plug trying to become as long as LORD ELON. Use your climbing, dangling, and stretching skills to collect coins and buy length upgrades. Will LORD ELON accept you?

name: File Destined
description: Can this last case of Oliver, all be just a small part of a bigger picture? Gather clues, unravel the mystery behind the case and uncover the truth.

name: Quiz Thiz Spain: Gold Edition
description: Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Stack Machines
description: Push and pop your way through Stack Machines - an open-ended puzzle programming game. Use a variety of modules to read, transform and output different input sequences. Optimize your solutions for size, module count, speed and cost-effectiveness.

name: Aeolus Fighter 2
description: 'Aeolus Fighter 2' is a vertical scroll flight shooting game. The player controls the main character's fighter to fight with the enemy in the universe.

name: Choppertchi
description: The Choppertchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano based on the character Tony Tony Chopper from the anime and manga series One Piece by Eiichiro Oda.

name: Super Vadimka VII: The Nightmares of The Current Continue
description: Super Vadimka VII: The Nightmares of The Current Continue is an exhilarating platformer action game that pushes the boundaries of gameplay while infusing elements of survival horror. Released on February 25, 2023, for Windows, the title is crafted by the talented duo at VadimBallzGames and HyperTheLoopa420, featuring the iconic character, Super Vadimka, in his most challenging adventure yet. This final installment in the Super Vadimka series elevates the gaming experience with its high-quality graphics and intricately designed levels that demand precision and skill from players.

name: Secret of Dungeon
description: Secret of Dungeon is an Indie MMORPG strategy game based on PvP combat as well as Co-Op, with dungeons and Boss to be defeated in a group so you can have lots of fun and laughter. With several aspects of RPG like Trade between Players, Party System and Guild System.

name: Castle Karthenfrost
description: A Medium-to-large Knave map which uses Arcane Dimensions, set in the cold wasteland realm of Karthenfrost. Has a moderate amount of monsters.

name: Club Penguin Avalanche
description: Club Penguin Avalanche is an unofficial revival of the beloved Club Penguin made by fans, specifically crafted for and by Brazilian players. Featuring a dedicated launcher, this nostalgic virtual world offers a unique and immersive experience reminiscent of the original game. Players can waddle around as penguins, explore various places, and participate in fun activities and minigames, just like in the old Club Penguin.

name: Dog Collab
description:
After 1.5 years, the Dog Collab is here! Earn over 70 stars across courses crafted by iconic SM64 modders, with the help of a furry friend! Fight tough bosses, play unique minigames, and put your platforming skills to the test in this hack. Optimized for real N64 hardware!

Levels created by Ashley, MrComit, someone2639, Cheezepin, BeverlyBean, Rovert, CowQuack, KeyBlader, an_unidentified_emu, Yoshi Milkman, Fazana, and thecozies.

name: Scarlet Sand Sojourn
description: During the event, complete Dehya's and Dunyarzad's desert outing and collect all the travel experiences on the way to receive in-game item rewards.

name: Tumble Tundra
description: Tumble Tundra is a Foddian Platformer where you must escape a mysterious crevice that you've fallen into. Will you be able to make it to the top?

name: Aikagi Complete Box
description: Aikagi Complete Box is a bundle that includes Aikagi, Aikagi After Days, Aikagi 2 and Aikagi 3.

name: Adorimon: Adventure of Monster
description:
Collect and train Adorimon, build a team to fight other monster armies.

This is a classic monster catching game, form your team and fight to win.

A long way ahead to evolve your army. Be the best Adorimon trainer.

name: Octopath Traveler II: Steelbook Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tic Tac Bow
description:
The game is archery tic-tac-toe, where the goal is to alternately shoot arrows and align the targets.
Unlike normal, the player can change the opponent's target by hitting it more centrally.
Selected for the archery category of Olympic eSports Week 2023.

name: Boom
description: Get ready for explosive excitement in Boom! In this fast-paced action game, you'll face off against a variety of monsters in each stage. As you progress through the levels, you'll have the opportunity to pick up different bombs and power-ups that will help you defeat your enemies and advance to the next stage. With challenging gameplay, colorful graphics, and a variety of levels to play through, Boom will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Don't wait any longer to join the action - download Boom today and see if you have what it takes to be the ultimate bomber, but be careful not to get blown up first!

name: Five Nights at Sid's
description: A Five NIght's fangame featuring Ice Age characters. Heavily inspired by the "Bora Tomar Uma" meme.

name: Enthralled
description:
Enthralled is a hypnotic game about getting seduced and mind-controlled by a demanding vampire queen, played by the Secret Subject!

It uses real hypnosis and toys heavily with D/s dynamics, fractionation, obedience, getting turned into a vampire's mindless thrall, being told to resist trance (and failing), and being made to wear a collar.

name: Cave Ranger
description: When the Bitty Gang steals the town's livelihood and takes it underground, a lone, brave cowboy must come to the rescue. Cave Ranger is an 8-bit inspired, retro platform game. Rescue sheep, fight outlaws, and face down dangerous critters. With a whip and pistol at his disposal, the cave ranger must traverse old mines, water reservoirs, and even a saw mill! It is a lighthearted, laid back western, full of platformer fun.

name: Clean Paper
description: Clean Paper is a horror game with comedy overtones that doesn't last more than 15 minutes. an interdimensional giraffe brought you to her strange world to help her with an important task

name: Sex Advice Succubus
description: Sex Advice Succubus is a cozy mature chat simulator! You play as Qmin, a succubus who works for a company that provides advice to paying clients, with the goal of improving their sex life.

name: Class Reunion Chat Room
description: Amy receives an invitation to a group chat set up by some of her former classmates. Its purpose is to reconnect after all these years. But soon more and more disturbing facts about Amy's classmates are revealed, and Amy begins to fear that the people she's texting with may not be what they seem.

name: Swords & Bones: Extended Edition
description: This bundle includes the Spooky Skin DLC.

name: She Wants Me Dead: Extended Edition
description: Along the base game, you also get access to 2 DLC: artbook and soundtrack.

name: Hazard Horizon
description: Distant future. You are on a damaged space station with an unknown creature and dozens of panicked people. There are not enough resources for everyone, so you will have to work hard to survive and escape from this place.

name: Arcade Archives: Don Doko Don
description: "DON DOKO DON" is a fixed-screen action game released by TAITO in 1989. Take control of the old lumberjacks Bob and Jim to progress through a variety of tricky stages. Pick up items to power up, beat the boss at the end of each ROUND, and rescue the captive king and princess!

name: Creme de la Creme: A Silver Spoon
description: Become Gallatin's top student in A Silver Spoon! Discover hard-to-reach paths, achieve the highest grades, or play on hard mode. With these hints and cheats you'll never be late for class again!

name: Ink & Paper: DoodleCut
description:
Draw a line to enclose the area and doodle it.
Watch out for baddies who can catch you or cut your line!

name: Bit.Trip Collection
description: Venture with CommanderVideo on incredible journey through 8-bit classics! Experience various game modes and controlls inspired by retro arcade games, and win each level with epic beat in the background! Now in a 6-in-1 bundle!

name: Owlman
description: The following is a series of tapes recovered near the Overlook National Park where four people were recently reported missing- a family of three and one motorist.

name: Hentai Pussy 6
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Finger Football: Goal in One
description: Score in just one move in this relaxing and minimalist finger football puzzle game.

name: Larry's New Wheelchair
description: Larry decided to buy a new wheelchair online and with it he will be settling some scores...

name: Twerk it Girl!
description: You have no idea what to do? Simply, twerk it!

name: Hentai Military
description: Hentai Military is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of military and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Stonehenge
description:
A special prehistoric location with friends from the future.
This DLC includes:
- Roller coaster map: Stonehenge.
- One roller coaster cart.

name: The Pale Beyond: Deluxe Edition
description: The Pale Beyond Deluxe Edition includes the base game, the Digital Artbook and the Deluxe Soundtrack, which collects all 51 tracks from the game.

name: The Pale Beyond: Collectors Edition
description: The Pale Beyond Collector's Edition includes the base game and the Original Soundtrack, featuring a curated selection of 19 tracks from the game.

name: Lootbox Lyfe+
description: Metroidvania movement gameplay with soul-selling lootbox-based customization

name: In the Building: Hamsters
description: Is a game where you have to find all the cute hamsters. Hamsters will hide in all houses. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet.... Hamsters can hide in the most unpredictable places.

name: Snow Mountain
description: Survive as long as possible between the moving walls in the random direction Accel : Up Key Move : Left Arrow Key, Right Arrow Key

name: GyroGunner
description: An omnidirectional scrolling twin-stick shooter with pixel art reminiscent of the 80's.

name: Samurai Sword Stage
description: Samurai Sword Stage is a cool and simple samurai action game. Kill 100 enemies with your stylish swordsmanship.

name: Architect
description: Relax while building mind-bending structures and populating them with strange entities

name: Towards the Unknown
